problem_text:
A subgroup H is called a virtual retract of a group G if H is a retract of a finite-index subgroup of G. Is it true that every finitely generated subgroup of a finitely generated virtually free group is a virtual retract?
For motivation and partial results see (A. Minasyan, Int. Math. Res. Notes, 2021, no. 17 (2021), 13434–13477).
A. Minasyan
